title: Cards of Love: Justice
description: She's mine for a week...but I want forever.The richest families in the world don't bother with courtrooms to enforce their codes of honor.Noâ€”they come to me.The sight of Justice set my blood ablaze.Delivered to me by her family, she's in my hands now.But my entire existence depends on discretion.If I step out of line, the consequences will be deadly.Playing with her is a dangerous game.Only one of us will win.
author: Amelia Wilde
